long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-emicklei-go-restful for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.

$ gofed apidiff go-restful-5e1952ed0806503c059e4463c2654200660f484b go-restful-03f8ad5589baf3c67a448fd9354da27419db712d -c Package: . -function ServiceErrorHandleFunction: parameter count changed: 2 -> 3

golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc22

golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc21

golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.fc20

golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.el6

Package golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.el6: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.el6' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-6025/golang-github-emicklei-go-restful-1.1.3-0.2.git03f8ad5.el6 then log in and leave karma (feedback).
